snippet: Alabama running back Jalston Fowler is expected to miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.
abstract: University of Alabama running back Jalston Fowler will likely miss the remainder of the season due to a knee injury.
lead_paragraph: Alabama running back Jalston Fowler is expected to miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.

headline.seo: Alabama Running Back Jalston Fowler Out for Season
headline.main: Alabama Running Back Out for the Season
headline.print_headline: Alabama Running Back Out for the Season
